    • searchSystemByUserId

      public Object[] searchSystemByUserId(int userId)
      Searches for a user with the given ID in all Velib systems.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to search for
      Returns:
      an array containing the Velib system and the user if found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no user is found with the given ID in any Velib network

    • searchSystembyStationId

      public Object[] searchSystembyStationId(int stationId)
      Searches for a docking station with the given ID in all Velib systems.
      Parameters:
      stationId - the ID of the docking station to search for
      Returns:
      an array containing the Velib system and the docking station if found
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no docking station is found with the given ID in any Velib network

    • setupVelib

      public VelibSystem setupVelib(String name, int nstations, int nslots, double s, int nbikes)
      Sets up a Velib network with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Velib network
      nstations - the number of stations in the network
      nslots - the number of slots per station
      s - the size of the network area
      nbikes - the total number of bikes in the network
      Returns:
      the created VelibSystem object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the total number of bikes is higher than the total number of parking slots

    • setOffline

      public void setOffline(String networkName, int stationId)
      Sets a docking station in the specified Velib network to offline status.
      Parameters:
      networkName - the name of the Velib network
      stationId - the ID of the docking station
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no Velib network is found with the given name or no docking station is found with the given ID

    • setOnline

      public void setOnline(String networkName, int stationId)
      Sets a docking station in the specified Velib network to online status.
      Parameters:
      networkName - the name of the Velib network
      stationId - the ID of the docking station
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no Velib network is found with the given name or no docking station is found with the given ID
